  date: "12/2023 – 02/2024",
  description: "Welcome to HeroHop, an exciting 2D platformer game where you play as a brave dragon with unique abilities. Navigate through challenging levels, showcasing your skills with movement, jumps, double jumps, wall walks, and fireball attacks. But beware, as you face off against dangerous traps like arrows, fire, and a menacing spike ball that hunts you down. You must also outsmart a formidable knight enemy guarding a secret location. Collect health items to stay in the fight and conquer two thrilling levels. Are you ready to take on the challenge and save the day? Join the adventure now!",

  imagesDesktop: ["Images/Projects/HeroHop/1.png", "Images/Projects/HeroHop/2.png", "Images/Projects/HeroHop/3.png", "Images/Projects/HeroHop/4.png", "Images/Projects/HeroHop/5.png", "Images/Projects/HeroHop/6.png"]

  id: 2,
  name: "Survive The Shadows",
  subname: "2D Platformer Game",
  GitHub_Link: "https://github.com/GovindChoudhary844/Survive_the_shadows",
  Game_Link: "https://govindchoudhary844.github.io/Survive_the_shadows_URL/",
  videoDesktop: "https://www.youtube.com/embed/6lSn6Rup8RA",
  date: "12/2023 – 02/2024",
  description: "Survive the Shadows is an action-packed 2D platformer where you control a hero equipped with a sword, capable of performing 3 unique attack moves, a jump attack with 2 special maneuvers, and throwing arrows. Battle against a vigilant knight who patrols the area, detecting walls and edges, and the dangerous FlyingEye that attacks when the player is within range. Collect health pickups to stay in the fight. Featuring smooth camera transitions powered by Cinemachine, responsive controls via Unity's Input System, and beautifully designed levels created with the 2D Tilemap Editor, **Survive the Shadows** offers a thrilling and immersive experience. Ready for the challenge? Play now!",
  imagecharacter: "Images/Projects/Survive_the_shadows/Profile.png",
  imagesDesktop: ["Images/Projects/Survive_the_shadows/1.png", "Images/Projects/Survive_the_shadows/2.png", "Images/Projects/Survive_the_shadows/3.png", "Images/Projects/Survive_the_shadows/4.png", "Images/Projects/Survive_the_shadows/5.png", "Images/Projects/Survive_the_shadows/6.png", "Images/Projects/Survive_the_shadows/7.png", "Images/Projects/Survive_the_shadows/8.png", "Images/Projects/Survive_the_shadows/9.png"]
}, {
  id: 3,
  name: "2D Top-Down RPG Game",
  subname: "2D Top-Down RPG",
  GitHub_Link: "https://github.com/GovindChoudhary844/Survive_the_shadows",
  Game_Link: "https://govindchoudhary844.github.io/Survive_the_shadows_URL/",
  videoDesktop: "https://www.youtube.com/embed/6lSn6Rup8RA",
  date: "12/2023 – 02/2024",
  description: "2D Top-Down RPG Game/n\n▪ Implements a player input system for smooth and responsive controls.\n▪ Features dynamic animations for player and enemy actions, including dashing and knockback.\n▪ Includes a modular weapon system with melee, ranged attacks, and cooldown management.\n▪ Provides interactive environments with destructible objects, rule tiles, and portal effects.\n▪ Enhances gameplay with 2D lighting, fade transitions, and camera control using Cinemachine.\n▪ Supports multiple scenes with seamless transitions and immersive effects.\n▪ Designed a user-friendly UI with toggle options and transparency settings for better gameplay experience.",
  imagecharacter: "Images/Projects/Survive_the_shadows/Profile.png",
  imagesDesktop: ["Images/Projects/Survive_the_shadows/1.png", "Images/Projects/Survive_the_shadows/2.png", "Images/Projects/Survive_the_shadows/3.png", "Images/Projects/Survive_the_shadows/4.png", "Images/Projects/Survive_the_shadows/5.png", "Images/Projects/Survive_the_shadows/6.png", "Images/Projects/Survive_the_shadows/7.png", "Images/Projects/Survive_the_shadows/8.png", "Images/Projects/Survive_the_shadows/9.png"]

sourcesContent:
const projectsAPI = [
  {
    id: 1,
    name: "Hero Hop",
    subname: "2D Platformer Game",
    GitHub_Link: "https://github.com/GovindChoudhary844/Hero_Hop",
    Game_Link: "https://govindchoudhary844.github.io/HeroHop_Game_URL/",
    videoDesktop: "https://www.youtube.com/embed/6lSn6Rup8RA",
    date: "12/2023 – 02/2024",
    description:
      "Welcome to HeroHop, an exciting 2D platformer game where you play as a brave dragon with unique abilities. Navigate through challenging levels, showcasing your skills with movement, jumps, double jumps, wall walks, and fireball attacks. But beware, as you face off against dangerous traps like arrows, fire, and a menacing spike ball that hunts you down. You must also outsmart a formidable knight enemy guarding a secret location. Collect health items to stay in the fight and conquer two thrilling levels. Are you ready to take on the challenge and save the day? Join the adventure now!",
    imagecharacter: "Images/Projects/HeroHop/6.png",
    imagesDesktop: [
      "Images/Projects/HeroHop/1.png",
      "Images/Projects/HeroHop/2.png",
      "Images/Projects/HeroHop/3.png",
      "Images/Projects/HeroHop/4.png",
      "Images/Projects/HeroHop/5.png",
      "Images/Projects/HeroHop/6.png",
    ],
  },
  {
    id: 2,
    name: "Survive The Shadows",
    subname: "2D Platformer Game",
    GitHub_Link: "https://github.com/GovindChoudhary844/Survive_the_shadows",
    Game_Link: "https://govindchoudhary844.github.io/Survive_the_shadows_URL/",
    videoDesktop: "https://www.youtube.com/embed/6lSn6Rup8RA",
    date: "12/2023 – 02/2024",
    description:
      "Survive the Shadows is an action-packed 2D platformer where you control a hero equipped with a sword, capable of performing 3 unique attack moves, a jump attack with 2 special maneuvers, and throwing arrows. Battle against a vigilant knight who patrols the area, detecting walls and edges, and the dangerous FlyingEye that attacks when the player is within range. Collect health pickups to stay in the fight. Featuring smooth camera transitions powered by Cinemachine, responsive controls via Unity's Input System, and beautifully designed levels created with the 2D Tilemap Editor, **Survive the Shadows** offers a thrilling and immersive experience. Ready for the challenge? Play now!",
    imagecharacter: "Images/Projects/Survive_the_shadows/Profile.png",
    imagesDesktop: [
      "Images/Projects/Survive_the_shadows/1.png",
      "Images/Projects/Survive_the_shadows/2.png",
      "Images/Projects/Survive_the_shadows/3.png",
      "Images/Projects/Survive_the_shadows/4.png",
      "Images/Projects/Survive_the_shadows/5.png",
      "Images/Projects/Survive_the_shadows/6.png",
      "Images/Projects/Survive_the_shadows/7.png",
      "Images/Projects/Survive_the_shadows/8.png",
      "Images/Projects/Survive_the_shadows/9.png",
    ],
  },
  {
    id: 3,
    name: "2D Top-Down RPG Game",
    subname: "2D Top-Down RPG",
    GitHub_Link: "https://github.com/GovindChoudhary844/Survive_the_shadows",
    Game_Link: "https://govindchoudhary844.github.io/Survive_the_shadows_URL/",
    videoDesktop: "https://www.youtube.com/embed/6lSn6Rup8RA",
    date: "12/2023 – 02/2024",
    description:
      "2D Top-Down RPG Game/n\n▪ Implements a player input system for smooth and responsive controls.\n▪ Features dynamic animations for player and enemy actions, including dashing and knockback.\n▪ Includes a modular weapon system with melee, ranged attacks, and cooldown management.\n▪ Provides interactive environments with destructible objects, rule tiles, and portal effects.\n▪ Enhances gameplay with 2D lighting, fade transitions, and camera control using Cinemachine.\n▪ Supports multiple scenes with seamless transitions and immersive effects.\n▪ Designed a user-friendly UI with toggle options and transparency settings for better gameplay experience.",
    imagecharacter: "Images/Projects/Survive_the_shadows/Profile.png",
    imagesDesktop: [
      "Images/Projects/Survive_the_shadows/1.png",
      "Images/Projects/Survive_the_shadows/2.png",
      "Images/Projects/Survive_the_shadows/3.png",
      "Images/Projects/Survive_the_shadows/4.png",
      "Images/Projects/Survive_the_shadows/5.png",
      "Images/Projects/Survive_the_shadows/6.png",
      "Images/Projects/Survive_the_shadows/7.png",
      "Images/Projects/Survive_the_shadows/8.png",
      "Images/Projects/Survive_the_shadows/9.png",
    ],
  },
];

export default projectsAPI;
